featured.text: To discuss the content of alcoholic drinks in ancient Europe.
The consumption of alcoholic beverages was unusual in ancient Russia.
However, many people who tested positive on the test have claimed that they only drank a “non-alcoholic” energy drink.

definition.zh_def: 酗酒者；對酒精有依賴的人
definition.en_def: A person who is dependent on or addicted to alcohol.
definition.example: He struggled for years to overcome his identity as an alcoholic.
